description: Biological material used in the experiment with information on modifications, treatments and preparation.
title: Biosample

___relationship_type.description: A controlled term specifying the relationship between biosamples.
___relationship_type.title: Relationship Type

___description.description: A plain text description of the biosample. Do not include experiment details, constructs or treatments.
___description.title: Description

___treatments.comment: See Treatment sheet or collection for exisiting items
___treatments.title: Treatments

items.description: Specific information for specific types of protocols
items.title: Protocols

___biosource.description: The cell lines or tissue types used in the experiment
___biosource.comment: See Biosource sheet or collection for existing items
___biosource.title: Biosources

___modifications.description: Expression or targeting vectors stably transfected to generate Crispr'ed or other genomic modification
___modifications.comment: See Modifications sheet or collection for existing items
___modifications.title: Stable Genomic Modifications

items.description: A single genomic modification of the biosample.
items.title: Modifications

___cell_culture_details.description: Link to biosample_cell_culture Items that carry cell culture related parameters
___cell_culture_details.title: Cell Culture Information

items.description: Specific information for specific batches of cells
items.title: Culture Details
